data.name: Status.LoadingProfiles
data.comment: Status message shown when loading game profiles

data.name: Status.ProfilesLoaded
data.comment: Status message shown when profiles are successfully loaded

data.name: Status.ErrorLoadingProfiles
data.comment: Status message shown when profile loading fails

data.name: Status.ScanningForGames
data.comment: Status message shown when scanning for game installations

data.name: Status.ScanComplete
data.comment: Status message shown when scan completes. {0} is the count of installations found

data.name: Status.ScanFailed
data.comment: Status message shown when scan fails. {0} is the error message

data.name: Status.ErrorDuringScan
data.comment: Status message shown when an unexpected error occurs during scan

data.name: Error.ServiceNotAvailable
data.comment: Error message shown when required service is not available

data.name: Warning.LoggerNotAvailable
data.value: Logger not available - scan may proceed without detailed logging
data.comment: Warning message shown when logger is not available

data.name: Profile.AutoCreated
data.comment: Auto-generated profile name. {0} is the installation type

data.name: Profile.AutoCreatedDescription
data.comment: Auto-generated profile description. {0} is installation type, {1} is path

data.name: Status.CreatingProfiles
data.comment: Status message during profile creation. {0} is installation count

data.name: Status.ProfileCreated
data.comment: Log message for successful profile creation. {0} is profile name, {1} is installation ID

data.name: Status.ProfileCreationFailed
data.value: Failed to create profile for installation {0}: {1}
data.comment: Log message for failed profile creation. {0} is installation ID, {1} is error message

data.name: Status.ProfileCreationComplete
data.comment: Summary message after profile creation. {0} is success count, {1} is failure count

data.name: Status.NoInstallationsFound
data.comment: Message shown when no game installations are detected

data.name: Warning.InstallationScanFailed
data.comment: Warning message when installation scan fails. {0} is error details

data.name: Title.GameProfiles
data.comment: Page title for the Game Profiles section

data.name: Subtitle.GameProfiles
data.value: Select a profile to launch or create a new one
data.comment: Page subtitle for the Game Profiles section

data.name: Button.AddNewProfile
data.comment: Button to create a new game profile

data.name: Status.Scanning
data.comment: Status shown during game scanning

data.name: Status.ProfilesLoadedCount
data.comment: Status showing number of loaded profiles. {0} = count

data.name: Status.LaunchingProfile
data.comment: Status when launching a profile. {0} = profile name

data.name: Status.ProfileLaunchedSuccess
data.comment: Success message after launching. {0} = profile name, {1} = process ID

data.name: Status.StoppingProfile
data.comment: Status when stopping a profile. {0} = profile name

data.name: Status.ProfileStoppedSuccess
data.comment: Success message after stopping. {0} = profile name

data.name: Status.EditModeEnabled
data.comment: Status when edit mode is turned on

data.name: Status.EditModeDisabled
data.comment: Status when edit mode is turned off

data.name: Status.SavingProfiles
data.comment: Status while saving profiles

data.name: Status.ProfilesSaved
data.comment: Success message after saving profiles

data.name: Status.DeletingProfile
data.comment: Status when deleting a profile. {0} = profile name

data.name: Status.ProfileDeletedSuccess
data.comment: Success message after deleting. {0} = profile name

data.name: Status.ProfileUpdatedSuccess
data.comment: Success message after updating a profile

data.name: Status.NewProfileWindowClosed
data.comment: Status when new profile window closes

data.name: Status.PreparingWorkspace
data.comment: Status when preparing workspace. {0} = profile name

data.name: Status.WorkspacePrepared
data.comment: Success message after workspace preparation. {0} = profile name, {1} = path

data.name: Error.ProfileManagerNotAvailable
data.comment: Error when profile manager service is unavailable

data.name: Error.ProfileManagerNotInitialized
data.value: Game Profile Manager service is not initialized
data.comment: Error when profile manager is not initialized

data.name: Error.FailedToLoadProfilesWithReason
data.comment: Error loading profiles. {0} = error details

data.name: Error.FailedToLaunchProfile
data.comment: Error launching profile. {0} = profile name, {1} = error

data.name: Error.ErrorLaunchingProfile
data.comment: Generic error launching profile. {0} = profile name

data.name: Error.FailedToStopProfile
data.comment: Error stopping profile. {0} = profile name, {1} = error

data.name: Error.ErrorSavingProfiles
data.comment: Generic error saving profiles

data.name: Error.FailedToDeleteProfile
data.comment: Error deleting profile. {0} = profile name, {1} = error

data.name: Error.ErrorDeletingProfile
data.comment: Generic error deleting profile. {0} = profile name

data.name: Error.ProfileSettingsNotAvailable
data.comment: Error when profile settings are unavailable

data.name: Error.ProfileEditorNotAvailable
data.comment: Error when profile editor is unavailable

data.name: Error.FailedToLoadProfile
data.comment: Error loading a specific profile. {0} = error details

data.name: Error.MainWindowNotFound
data.value: Could not find main window to open settings
data.comment: Error when main window cannot be found

data.name: Error.ErrorCreatingNewProfile
data.comment: Generic error creating a new profile

data.name: Error.ProfileLauncherNotAvailable
data.comment: Error when profile launcher is unavailable

data.name: Error.FailedToPrepareWorkspace
data.comment: Error preparing workspace. {0} = profile name, {1} = error

data.name: Error.ErrorPreparingWorkspace
data.comment: Generic error preparing workspace. {0} = profile name

data.name: WorkspaceStatus.NotPrepared
data.comment: Workspace status when not yet prepared

data.name: WorkspaceStatus.Symlinked
data.comment: Workspace status when using symlinks

data.name: WorkspaceStatus.Copied
data.comment: Workspace status when files are copied

data.name: WorkspaceStatus.Hybrid
data.comment: Workspace status when using hybrid strategy

data.name: WorkspaceStatus.HardLinked
data.comment: Workspace status when using hard links

data.name: WorkspaceStatus.Prepared
data.comment: Generic workspace status when prepared

data.comment: Steam installation platform name

data.name: InstallationType.EaApp
data.comment: EA App installation platform name

data.comment: The First Decade installation type name

data.comment: Wine/Linux installation platform name

data.name: InstallationType.Retail
data.comment: Retail installation type name

data.name: InstallationType.CdIso
data.comment: CD/ISO installation type name

data.name: InstallationType.PcGame
data.comment: Default PC game installation type name

data.name: GameType.Generals
data.comment: Command and Conquer Generals game name
